# AI Stock Insight Agent - Python Dependencies

# To install all dependencies for this project, run:
# pip install -r requirements.txt

# This file was generated to ensure reproducible builds.
# It pins the exact version of every library.

# --- Core Web Framework & UI ---
streamlit==1.33.0
gunicorn==22.0.0

# --- Data Handling & Numerical Computation ---
pandas==2.2.2
numpy==1.26.4  # Pinned to <2.0 to maintain compatibility with older libraries
scipy==1.12.0   # Pinned to a version compatible with numpy 1.x

# --- Data Acquisition & Scraping ---
feedparser==6.0.11
requests==2.31.0
beautifulsoup4==4.12.3
yfinance==0.2.37
cloudscraper==1.2.71
httpx==0.27.0     # For async scraping

# --- NLP & Machine Learning ---
spacy==3.7.4
thefuzz==0.22.1
python-Levenshtein==0.25.1 # Speeds up thefuzz
groq==0.9.0

# --- Database Connectors ---
psycopg2-binary==2.9.9  # For PostgreSQL
neo4j==5.18.0           # For Neo4j

# --- Utilities ---
python-dotenv==1.0.1
protobuf==3.20.3 # Pinned to a stable 3.x version to avoid conflicts
tqdm==4.66.4      # For progress bars in scripts
